original_text: Each of you should continue as you were when God called you to come to him.
korean_text: 각 사람은 부르심을 받은 그 부르심 그대로 지내라

sentences.original_text: Each of you should continue as you were
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각자는 있던 그대로 계속해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: when God called you to come to him
